Title: The Audit
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Carly Hallam, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor), Carly Hallam (story editor), Alexis Wilkinson (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: The squad tries to save their precinct from getting shut down when it's being audited by Amy's ex-boyfriend Teddy.
